70010000089146.description:
A Dance of Fire and Ice is a deceptively simple rhythm game: press the button along to the beat to keep your orbiting planets on the path.

But the path isn't always so simple. Before long, you'll travel across different twisting shapes and patterns, representing different rhythms spread across all sorts of genres.

This version includes the base game ""A Dance of Fire and Ice"", the expansion ""Neo Cosmos"", and all-new 4-player local multiplayer.

EXPLORE THE COSMOS
Soar through each genre of music in a variety of colorful fantasy landscapes in over 30 different worlds.

PREDICT EVERY MOVEMENT
With a track that shows you every rhythm ahead of time, you’ll learn to sight-read levels as they come. No tricks, and nothing is reaction-based.

TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS
Play in a group of up to four friends in local cooperative play! When a friend misses a beat, keep pushing onward to revive them and pull them back into the song.

CHALLENGE THE OVERSEER IN NEO COSMOS
When you're ready for a challenge, jump into the Neo Cosmos story expansion. Directed by TaroNuke (creator of NotITG and UKSRT), it includes plenty of surprises, new characters, and whole new game mechanics to mix things up.
70010000089146.intro: Use rhythm to guide planets through the cosmos, solo or in 4-player co-op!
70010000089146.name: A Dance of Fire and Ice

70010000094881.description:
The long-running Hakuoki otome visual novel series enters a new era! Hakuoki SSL ~Sweet School Life~ puts a modern spin on the Edo period romance of the main series, instead casting heroine Chizuru and the handsome warriors of the Shinsengumi as students and teachers living in modern Japan. School life antics ensue as these beloved characters hold a school festival, stress over midterms, get into watergun fights and more!

Experience a fun slice-of-life story through unlockable event scenes, engaging dialogue and beautifully illustrated character portraits, all localized in English for the first time. Explore unique endings with each character and enjoy mini-games that make this standalone entry extra special!

• Take the role of Chizuru as she’s surrounded by familiar faces in a new modern setting!
• Engage in fun mini-games with the handsome warriors of the Shinsengumi.
• Make key choices and discover unique endings with each possible love interest!
• Enjoy voiceovers in Japanese and newly localized text in English.
• Navigate scenarios with ease using a variety of UI controls and preferences!
70010000094881.intro: Reunite with familiar faces in a light-hearted modern setting filled with fun and fluffy romance!
70010000094881.name: Hakuoki SSL ~Sweet School Life~

70010000097730.description:
Centipede Gun is a creature-building roguelite, where you create unusual beings by combining different shapes, modules, and... weapons!?
Try out insane combinations and try to break the game with the craziest creations! Each combination offers new possibilities to defeat enemies in increasingly challenging battles. After each round, use the money you earn to buy different units in the store and further strengthen your centipede of destruction. But be careful — as you evolve, enemies also become stronger, testing the limits of your creativity and strategy.

Assemble strange and powerful centipedes whose weapons automatically attack when enemies approach. Use special modules to add extra effects to your attacks and combine modules of the same type to evolve them, unlocking secret abilities as you reach new levels of power. Survive if you can and find out how far your centipede can go!
70010000097730.name: Centipede Gun

70010000099768.description:
Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension marries classic marble-shooter thrills with an explorable hub world! Dash your marble-loaded avatar across a vibrant central plaza dotted with portals to four zany realms:
•	Soccer Stadium Fields – Defend the goal-line against rolling soccer marbles.
•	Candy Kingdom – Halt candy spheres before they flood the sugar gate.
•	Galactic Orbit – Stop cosmic marbles and rogue planets from drifting into the void.
•	Jurassic Ridge – Prevent prehistoric marbles from tumbling off the volcanic cliff.
Select any level portal, then position yourself at the center of winding paths and launch marbles to match three or more identical orbs. Trigger spectacular combos, clear each wave before it crosses your boundary, and earn up to three stars per stage.
Every ten cleared levels, dash back to the hub and advance into the next area. Discover hidden shortcuts, unlock bonus challenges, and collect special tokens that reveal the Crazy Marble Dimension’s secrets. With each realm offering unique marble colors, path shapes, moving obstacles, and escalating speeds, no two expeditions are the same!
Addictive, family-friendly, and endlessly replayable, Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension challenges you to master marble magic across four wildly different themes.
70010000099768.intro: Enter Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension! Dash through Soccer, Candy, Space & Dino realms, blasting marbles before they reach the goal!
70010000099768.name: Zumba World - The Crazy Marble Dimension

70010000100664.description:
In (Dis)Assemble, moving blocks has never been so challenging or so satisfying. You control two geometric shapes at once, one with each hand. Sounds simple? Wait until obstacles enter the scene.

With clean, minimalist 3D visuals, each level reveals a new architectural surprise. One pushes, the other dodges, and you must think in perfect sync. Master the controls, master the space, and guide your duo of shapes to the finish line.

If you enjoy games that test your coordination, logic, and patience, sometimes all at once, (Dis)Assemble was made just for you.

Highlights:

Challenging, rewarding puzzles
Unique dual control assembly mechanic
Colourful, high contrast visuals

Get ready to assemble, disassemble, and literally rack your brain.
70010000100664.intro: Explore, think, and move with precision
70010000100664.name: (Dis)Assemble

70010000102649.description:
Lil Gator Game

Embark on an adorable adventure, discover new friends and uncover everything the island has to offer.
Climb, Swim, Glide and slide your way into the hearts of the many different characters you meet on your travels!

The island is your playground
There’s a buddy atop every hill in this open-world, movement-focused adventure and they all seem to need help! Bop cardboard baddies, brave serene hills and forests, and scale sheer rocks that only a kid would dare!

Joyful Exporation
Explore a lovingly crafted island full to the brim with areas to discover, friends to make and joy to be had. Each area of the island brings unique quests and characters to meet. Glide through the mountain tops and drop in on the Theatre Troupe kids, swing your stick sword through the forest with the Prep schoolers or find the ‘Cool Kids’ down in the Creaklands. With plenty more areas to discover, there's no knowing who you might run into!

Make Friends
The world is big when you’re a lil gator... Good thing it’s also full of friends! Make new friends and invite them to play in the islands playground. Each new friend you make will add to your adventure, but making new friends isn’t always easy, You might have to complete a quest or two!

Crafty Customization
Collect arts & crafts supplies all over the island! Use them to make yourself all kinds of goodies and bring the playground to life! Craft new abilities - use your ragdoll teddy to ragdoll lil gator from mountain top to the valleys below! Skim pebbles into hard to reach cardboard baddies!

Bop Baddies
A no-pressure adventure game! Lil Gator game focuses on adventure and play, don't let a health bar hold you back from reaching your goal!

Lil Gator Game: In the Dark DLC

Make way for Lil Gator Game: In the Dark. Lil Gator is back with an all new BIG DLC Expansion, doubling the size of Lil Gator Game.

In this charming DLC you’ll find that new adventures and friends are just beneath the surface—literally! Get ready to “cave in” to the fun and find that you’re stalag-right where you belong!

This BIG DLC is filled to the brim with all the charm and humour you loved in Lil Gator Game. There is a buddy in every cave and crevasse in this NEW, BIG, UNDERGROUND ADVENTURE!
70010000102649.intro: The complete Lil Gator adventure, all bundled up in one heartwarming package.
70010000102649.name: Lil Gator Game: Gator of the Year Edition

70010000104094.description:
The city belongs to the night, but it doesn’t forgive mistakes.

You are a vampire on the run, hiding among streets, dark alleys, and forgotten places where danger and desire walk side by side. 

Every night brings new choices, new encounters, and new risks.

In Vampire Girls Love Story: Date or Die, time is always moving forward. Days pass. Hunters get closer. And the girls you meet are drawn to something they can’t quite explain.

Some are intrigued by your presence.
Others sense the danger beneath it.
All of them can change your fate.

This is a narrative visual novel where romance and survival are tightly connected. Exploring the city unlocks locations, abilities, and story paths, while conversations and decisions determine who trusts you, who helps you, and who gets close enough to matter.

But attraction alone won’t keep you alive.

Vampire hunters patrol the streets, forcing you to escape, confront threats, and grow stronger. Learning new skills, choosing when to fight or flee, and deciding how to spend each night can mean the difference between freedom… or the end.

Some relationships offer safety.
Others grant power.
And a few may cost more than you’re willing to lose.

Balance desire, strategy, and survival in a story where every choice carries weight.


Features

● ROMANCE & SURVIVAL VISUAL NOVEL: A story that blends dating, danger, and supernatural tension.

● TIME PROGRESSION SYSTEM: Days advance as you explore, shaping events, encounters, and threats.

● CHOICE DRIVEN GAMEPLAY: Decisions affect relationships, abilities, and how the city reacts to you.

● VAMPIRE HUNTERS & ESCAPES: Avoid pursuit, face danger, and fight to stay alive.

● MULTIPLE ROUTES & ENDINGS: Different romances, powers, and outcomes based on how you play.


Date wisely.
Survive the night.
Play now!
70010000104094.intro:
Hunt the night.
Win their hearts.
Survive until dawn.
70010000104094.name: Vampire Girls Love Story: Date or Die

70010000104100.description:
The city after dark is never neutral.

Shadows stretch longer than they should, streets feel watched, and certain encounters carry an intensity that can’t be ignored. 

As a vampire on the run, every night pulls you deeper into a world where danger and attraction exist side by side.

In Vampire Boys Love Story: Date or Die, time moves relentlessly forward. Days pass. Hunters close in. And the boys you meet seem drawn to you: sometimes with curiosity, sometimes with caution, and sometimes with something far more dangerous.

These encounters aren’t simple.
Interest builds slowly.
Trust is never guaranteed.
And desire often comes with unspoken conditions.

This narrative visual novel blends romance with survival, placing equal weight on conversation, perception, and choice. 

But connection has a cost.

Vampire hunters patrol the night, forcing you to escape, fight, or disappear when necessary. 

Some relationships offer protection.
Others awaken power.
And a few may pull you toward a fate you can’t outrun.

Trust carefully.
Choose who you let close.
The night remembers every mistake.


Features:

● ROMANCE & SURVIVAL VISUAL NOVEL: A narrative experience where attraction and danger evolve together.

● TIME PROGRESSION SYSTEM: Days advance naturally, increasing tension and shaping events.

● CHOICE BASED DIALOGUE: Your words affect trust, desire, and who stands beside you.

● VAMPIRE HUNTERS & CONFRONTATIONS: Escape pursuit, face threats, and fight to stay alive.

● MULTIPLE ROUTES & ENDINGS: Relationships, abilities, and outcomes change with every decision.

● ANIME VISUAL STYLE: Expressive character art and moody city environments.


Choose your connections.
Survive the pursuit.
70010000104100.intro:
Embrace the night.
Feel the tension.
Survive what follows.
70010000104100.name: Vampire Boys Love Story: Date or Die

70010000105927.description:
[Game Overview]  
A roguelite action game set in the BLAZBLUE universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.
Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BLAZBLUE franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.

[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”,a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
In a last-ditch effort, the urgent *Research of Possibility* initiative seeks to collect *Shards of Possibility*—a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction.
These shards lie within the *Sea of Possibility*, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality.
Our protagonist, *Ace*, is the only being capable of diving into this sea.  
Guided by the elite researchers at *the Lab*, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
“……The Power of Azure.”
70010000105927.name: Blazblue Entropy Effect X

70010000107858.description:
With a beautiful watercolor touch, it depicts the life of a woman.

In her ordinary and modest life...experience her joys, her sorrows, her growth.
Witness the story she spins in a life woven by those around her.

♦A short and simple interactive adventure
♦Vivid visuals captured with watercolor and rotoscoping
♦Memorable theme music and soothing sounds
70010000107858.intro: A short tale, a long journey.
70010000107858.name: Dear me, I was...

70010000109929.description:
On an ill-fated hiking trip through the Black Forest, a mismatched group of students fall under the spell of a vengeful spirit trapped deep inside the woods. Now they must fight for their survival while trying to escape its corrupting influence.

Haunted by fear, trauma, and secrets of the past, each character is pushed to their breaking point, and their survival depends on your choices in this interactive psychological horror story by Trapped Predator.

As the events unfold, the members of the group find themselves confronted with their deepest fears and the shadows of their past. Who will survive? Help the protagonists stay alive during their horrific journey through the woods.
70010000109929.intro: An interactive psychological horror inspired by German folklore.
70010000109929.name: Heart of the Forest

70010000111906.description:
Released by Bothtec in 1985, EGGY is an action game that won the Excellence Award at the ""1st Bothtec Program Contest,"" depicting the battle between Earth and Gasp on Eggy. While an action title, it's not a frantic shooter; players control Ena to retrieve falling supplies. 

Due to quirky design—weapons being ground-attack only, mandatory crouching before flight, and a unique floating movement—avoiding enemy attacks is key. The 20-stage game is cleared when enough supplies drop. Novice players may prioritize survival (clearing without collecting), while experienced players can aim for a high score by collecting them.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and ""How to play"" screens are in English.
70010000111906.intro: An action game set on the planet Eggy, depicting the battle between Earth and Gusp. Control the body armor Ena to collect supplies flying in from above!
70010000111906.name: EGGCONSOLE EGGY PC-8801

70010000112197.description:
This game is a monorail simulation game set in Soi Mountain, a representative natural landmark in Korea.
Players become a monorail driver, taking in the breathtaking scenery of Soi Mountain and experiencing the unique experience of operating a monorail through beautiful natural and cultural heritage sites.

This is the first title to utilize actual filmed sections of the Hwagae Mountain monorail!

Key Features

• Realistic Monorail Driving Experience

Uses high-quality footage of actual Soi Mountain monorail sections.

Experience driving a monorail through diverse landscapes and terrain.

Two play modes: section-by-section driving mode and view mode.

• Control System

Just like driving a real monorail, precise control is required, including acceleration, deceleration, and stopping.

Compared to regular railways, the game features numerous uphill and downhill sections and significant impacts, requiring appropriate acceleration and deceleration control.

Ensuring on-time operation and stopping locations are crucial challenges, providing players with a truly engaging experience.

Supports Mascon for Nintendo Switch™ controllers from Zuiki.

• Realistic Scenery and Atmosphere

Pass through the Soisan Monorail section and admire the surrounding mountains, nature, and tourist attractions through footage shot on the actual monorail.

Enjoy the natural beauty of Korea through high-definition footage that realistically recreates the breathtaking scenery as you ride.

Recommended for:

• Gamers who enjoy monorails and natural scenery
• Players who want to experience Korea's famous attractions and travels through games
• Users who prefer realistic simulations that emphasize nature and scenery

This game offers a unique opportunity to experience Hwagaesan and its surrounding natural landscapes by monorail.
It's a truly unforgettable experience for lovers of Korean nature and monorails!
70010000112197.name: Korean Monorail Panorama Line Soisan

70010000112538.description:
Bubble Battle is a retro local multiplayer fighting game inspired by arcade classics. Players fly around with one simple objective: burst opponents’ bubbles before they burst yours. Collect powerups and out-maneuver opponents for fast-paced, addictive fun!

Bubble Battle is designed for those craving a local party game experience reminiscent of the 80's and 90's. 

Players fly around with one simple objective: burst opponents’ bubbles before they burst yours. Collect powerups and out-maneuver opponents for fast-paced, addictive fun!

FEATURES

- Easy to pick up and play thanks to simple controls

- Quick gameplay - rounds are usually less than 2 minutes (the arena becomes smaller toward the end of a round)

- A selection of variants, powerups, and levels deliver many unique experiences.
70010000112538.name: Bubble Battle

70010000113218.description: Cakey’s Twisted Bakery is a stealth survival horror where you must bake to survive. Trapped inside a deranged bakery crawling with sweet-toothed mascot monsters, you play as a lost child searching for your brother. Sneak through candy-colored corridors, gather bizarre ingredients, and craft color-coded pies that can stun and destroy your enemies. Hide under tables, time your moves, and uncover the dark secret behind the bakery’s grinning faces. One recipe at a time, fight your way out before you become the next dessert.
70010000113218.intro: Bake pies. Fight mascots. Escape the twisted bakery.
70010000113218.name: Cakey's Twisted Bakery

70010000114488.description:
Get ready for a brand-new puzzle battle experience that blends speed and strategy, now on Nintendo Switch™!

One wrong move can turn the tables, but a flash of inspiration can change everything!
Enjoy intense, edge-of-your-seat matches where the outcome isn't decided until the very end!

Customize the game to your liking with detailed settings such as stage size, music, time limits, and player colors!

With a Joy-Con™ controller for each player, you can challenge a friend to a serious one-on-one showdown!

《Rules》
Take turns placing blocks and connect lines vertically or horizontally!
When a line is completed, all blocks on that line disappear!
Earn points based on the number of your opponent's blocks removed!
The first player to reach the target score wins!

[Challenge Mode]
Battle against the CPU under special rules!
Each victory increases the difficulty, putting your thinking skills and speed to the test.
Push your limits and see how far you can go!

[Battle Mode]
Face off in intense one-on-one matches against the CPU or friends!
Adjust the settings and enjoy battles tailored to your preferences!

[Online Mode]
Compete in real-time against players from around the world!
Jump into Quick Matches that affect your rating, or enjoy casual Room Matches!
Test your strategy against skilled competitors nationwide!
70010000114488.intro:
Stylish visuals, music, and effects bring this game to life!
A simple yet strategic competitive puzzle battle!
70010000114488.name: BLOCLASH

70010000114815.description:
Hunters Music World is a rhythm game.
Press the buttons in time with the music!

It features theme songs from Mysterious Adventure of Michael, 
The Legend of the Dragonflame High School,
as well as tracks from a wide variety of genres—rock, punk, enka, Halloween songs, and more!

Aim for a Perfect Clear on every song!
70010000114815.intro: A rhythm game packed with over 40 tracks from HUNTERS!
70010000114815.name: HUNTERS Music World

70010000115442.description:
Your Choices Chart the Course.
Become the hero of your own high-seas saga. In a world where the rival kingdoms of Sidonia and Glorianna teeter on the brink of war, you are caught in a deadly race for survival. Hunted by the sadistic Captain Skarvench and drifting across the sea, you hold a secret that could rewrite the fate of the world. The power to become a legend of the seas is in your hands, but the deck is stacked against you.

Forge Your Unique Path.
Begin by choosing your class and assembling a crew of unlikely allies. Then, set sail into a rich narrative where every choice has profound consequences. Will you cross swords with undead pirates, survive deadly encounters with creatures of the deep, or dare to awaken ancient gods? Whatever path you take, the greatest threat is the vision of your own defeat. Your decisions create unique "Story Moments" that permanently shape your journey, making each playthrough distinctly yours. With hundreds of branching paths, uncover new secrets, alliances, and endings with every replay.
70010000115442.intro:
Set sail on your very own epic pirate adventure.
Choose your class, forge your legend, and navigate a sea of perilous choices in this immersive gamebook adventure.
70010000115442.name: Down Among the Dead Men

70010000115854.description:
This is a personality test game where you simply choose, by instinct, what the illustration looks like to you,
and discover insights into your hidden psychology.

Does this picture look like a bicycle? Binoculars? Or something else…!?

Depending on the option you choose, the game reveals what you value most,
the worries you may be carrying, and how others see you—
even personality traits you might not be aware of yourself.

Each result also comes with a bit of advice,
making it perfect not only for enjoying alone and getting to know yourself better,
but also for having fun in a group or as part of a streamer’s live commentary.


The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000115854.intro:
If this picture looks like ○○ to you, it means ××!?
A personality test that reveals your hidden psychology.
70010000115854.name: Optical Illusion Test

70010000116590.description:
The perfect sticker book game for kids & toddlers and sticker fans of all ages: Drag, drop and customize cute stickers to create magical scenes—from festive Christmas wonderlands with Santa, elves and reindeer to cozy farm animals, construction vehicles, dinosaurs & Jurassic World, knights & castles, space adventures, plants & flowers, Halloween, ocean & beach, sunny farm adventures with animals and tractors. Ideal for personalized digital greeting cards, birthday surprises or holiday wishes for friends and family.
Whether child in fantasy worlds or adult with nostalgia: Layer stickers, add speech bubbles and text for funny comics, experiment with special effect stickers.

Key Features:
+ Endless sticker customization: Theme categories (Christmas, Farm, Construction, Dinosaurs, Knights & Castles, Space, Plants & Flowers, Halloween, Ocean & Beach, Special Effects etc.) with hundreds of vibrant motifs
+ Drag & drop into your scene, then resize, rotate, flip, reorder layers – pro control
+ Creative tools for all ages: Mirror horizontally/vertically, spin clockwise/counter-clockwise, stack elements for depth – turn drag & drop into art
+ Surprise loved ones with custom Christmas, Halloween, birthday cards or comic strips with talking characters
+ Pure imagination: Build comics with speech bubbles, explore fantasy realms or design cozy farmyards
+ No rules – just relaxing fun
+ Great content for fantasy and creativity: Many sticker packs with holidays, animals, dinosaurs, space, knights, construction, Halloween, ocean and surprises

Join the sticker revolution: Create, share and spread joy in Super Sticker Studio – every scene tells a story! Ideal for kids, toddlers and fans of relaxing creative and family games. Boosts creativity and imagination. The perfect kids and toddlers and sticker fan game.
70010000116590.intro: Unleash your creativity in Super Sticker Studio, the ultimate casual sticker creator and design simulation game for kids, families, and sticker enthusiasts!
70010000116590.name: Super Sticker Studio - Creative Sticker Book Game for Kids

70010000118118.description:
Follow the courageous explorer Calyssa on her quest to find the entrance to ancient ruins, where a legendary treasure lies hidden. In this intense precision platformer, players will face deadly traps, dark creatures, and a forgotten curse — testing their reflexes and skills to uncover the secrets of the place and survive the dangerous journey.

With a mysterious atmosphere, fast-paced action, and tight controls, Calyssa delivers an engaging experience from start to finish.

Features:
- Challenging platforming focused on precision
- Climb walls, use your Dash ability, and defeat enemies with your sword
- Dark, trap-filled environments
- Unique Pixel Art visual style
- Intense and immersive soundtrack
70010000118118.intro: Follow Calyssa on her quest to find the entrance to ancient ruins!
70010000118118.name: Calyssa

70050000054229.description:
Make way for Lil Gator Game: In the Dark. Lil Gator is back with an all new BIG DLC Expansion, doubling the size of Lil Gator Game.
In this charming DLC you’ll find that new adventures and friends are just beneath the surface—literally! Get ready to “cave in” to the fun and find that you’re stalag-right where you belong!

This BIG DLC is filled to the brim with all the charm and humour you loved in Lil Gator Game. There is a buddy in every cave and crevasse in this NEW, BIG, UNDERGROUND ADVENTURE!

A Gorge-eous location
Getting to the caves is as easy as following your nose. In the base game’s island, you’ll stumble upon a lil’ entrance that’s been there all along, to take you below ground.

Wander a beautiful cave network where glowsticks light your path and cozy tunnels host hidden nooks and crannies filled with cute critters, secret treasures, and places to relax and take in the peaceful atmosphere.

All new friends to discover
On your travels you’ll meet a bunch of new pals! But remember making new friends isn’t always easy, you just might need to complete a quest or two! 

Face your frenemies
In a narrative twist, Lil Gator will take on some teenage troublemakers looking to disrupt the wholesome fun. Can Gator use their relentless optimism to bring these angsty adolescents onside, and just who is their leader?

Bring on the brand new gear
This DLC has all sorts of new toys to play with, including never before seen item types. Lil Gator can now double jump their way across canyons with a flick of a gymnastic ribbon and slams into cardboard crooks from above.

Embark on an expedition of family friendly fun in this cosy conclusion to Lil Gator’s Epic Adventure.
70050000054229.intro: The world just got a whole lot bigger for this Lil Gator!
70050000054229.name: Lil Gator Game: In the Dark

70050000062753.description:
[Deluxe Edition Contents]

70050000062753.name: Blazblue Entropy Effect X Deluxe upgrade pack

70050000067865.description:
This purchase also entitles you to the Pinball M version of the DLC.

Stay alive in the stunning yet hostile environments in three fantastic pinball tables inspired by the most iconic Bethesda franchises.

- Explore the secrets of the Wasteland in a world decimated by nuclear war, join Factions, raid Vaults and collect Bobbleheads on the Fallout™ Pinball table.
- Fight your way through the UAC research facility, taking on hordes of demons to earn the DOOM Slayer name on the DOOM™ Pinball table
- Craft weapons, wield magic, equip armor, buy and sell goods, mine materials, find trainers and complete side quests before defeating Alduin and fulfilling your destiny as the Dragonborn on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim™ Pinball table.
- Leaderboards, score tracking, exciting social features, and more
70050000067865.name: Pinball FX - Bethesda® Pinball

70050000067868.description:
This purchase also entitles you to the Pinball FX version of the DLC.

Stay alive in the stunning yet hostile environments in three fantastic pinball tables inspired by the most iconic Bethesda franchises.

- Explore the secrets of the Wasteland in a world decimated by nuclear war, join Factions, raid Vaults and collect Bobbleheads on the Fallout™ Pinball table.
- Fight your way through the UAC research facility, taking on hordes of demons to earn the DOOM Slayer name on the DOOM™ Pinball table
- Craft weapons, wield magic, equip armor, buy and sell goods, mine materials, find trainers and complete side quests before defeating Alduin and fulfilling your destiny as the Dragonborn on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim™ Pinball table.
- Leaderboards, score tracking, exciting social features, and more
70050000067868.name: Pinball M - Bethesda® Pinball

70070000031912.description:
[Game Overview]  
A *roguelite action game* set in the BLAZBLUE universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.
Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BLAZBLUE franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.
[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”,a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
In a last-ditch effort, the urgent *Research of Possibility* initiative seeks to collect *Shards of Possibility*—a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction.
These shards lie within the *Sea of Possibility*, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality.
Our protagonist, *Ace*, is the only being capable of diving into this sea.  
Guided by the elite researchers at *the Lab*, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
“……The Power of Azure.” 

[Deluxe Edition Contents]

*Blazblue Entropy Effect X – Standard Edition*  

* Two Character Palette Sets *  

*BLAZBLUE Character Palette [The Other Side] (14 Characters)*  
    * Hibiki  
    * Ragna  
    * Noel  
    * Λ-No.11-  
    * Es  
    * Rachel  
    * Taokaka  
    * Jin  
    * Kokonoe  
    * Hakumen  
    * Mai  
    * Hazama  
    * Bullet  
    * Naoto  
    * (This set will receive additional palettes for any characters added in future updates.)*  

*BLAZBLUE Character Palette [X-File] (14 Characters)*  
    * Hibiki  
    * Ragna  
    * Noel  
    * Λ-No.11- 
    * Es  
    * Rachel  
    * Taokaka  
    * Jin  
    * Kokonoe  
    * Hakumen  
    * Mai  
    * Hazama  
    * Bullet  
    * Naoto  
*(This set does not include palettes for future characters. Separate purchases may be required.)*  

*BLAZBLUE ENTROPY EFFECT X – Complete Original Soundtrack (5 Sets / 91 Tracks Total)*  
  * ACE-OST MIND TRAINING  
  * ACE-OST PHENOMENON  
  * ACE-OST MIND TRAINING II  
  * ACE-OST OTHERWORLD VOICE  
  * BLAZBLUE ENTROPY EFFECT X – OST Infinity Edition  

*Chibi Avatars*  
  * “???”  
  * Terumen

## *Notes*

* Content details and release schedules are subject to change without prior notice.  
* Some features may require the latest version of the game to access.
70070000031912.name: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X Deluxe Edition

70010000107295.description:
Freedom comes with four wheels and a full tank of gas. Start with a dusty old van and turn it into your dream home—or flip it for profit and chase your next build. Whether you're in it for the thrill of renovation or the call of the open road, this game lets you live the nomadic dream, no GPS required.

Explore a vibrant open world packed with hidden campsites, cozy lake views, and the occasional “did I take a wrong turn?” mountain trail. From serene forests to rugged backroads, every trip is its own story.

Customize every inch of your ride, pick your parking spot, and let the weather spice things up—from starry nights to soggy surprises. You can run a renovation empire, rent out vans to other wanderers, or just kick back by the fire and roast digital marshmallows.

No deadlines. No bosses. Just your van, your journey, and maybe a raccoon trying to steal your cooler.
70010000107295.intro: Home Is Where You Park It.
70010000107295.name: Van Life: Home Simulator

70010000112694.description:
READY OR DIE drops you into situations where hesitation can be fatal and discipline is the only path to survival. As the leader of an elite tactical unit, you are sent into volatile operations where chaos, fear, and uncertainty dominate every room you enter.

This tactical first-person shooter emphasizes methodical gameplay over raw firepower. Each mission challenges you to secure hostile locations, respond to unpredictable threats, and protect innocent lives under extreme pressure. Quick thinking, clear judgment, and proper use of tactical equipment are essential to keeping control when situations spiral out of hand.

Your actions are constantly evaluated. Following procedures, minimizing collateral damage, and making the right calls at the right moment will determine your mission rating and overall progression. Reckless choices may lead to success, but never without consequences.

Key Features

- Tactical FPS with a strong focus on realism and tension
- High-stakes operations involving civilians, hostages, and suspects
- Strategic room-clearing and multiple entry methods
- Reactive AI with dynamic and unpredictable behavior
- Performance-based ranking system influenced by your decisions
- Semi-open environments offering different tactical approaches

Every mission is a test of professionalism.

Stay calm, stay precise, and remember—when the door opens, you must be READY OR DIE.
70010000112694.name: READY OR DIE

70010000113046.description:
The bar is open, the lights are on, and a busy night awaits. In Bartender Simulator 2026, each shift puts your skills to the test as orders come in fast and customers expect perfection.

Step behind the counter and take full control of every pour, mix, and serve. Timers are always running, guests are watching, and even small mistakes can turn a smooth night into chaos.

Prepare a wide range of drinks by following recipes, using bar tools, and managing ingredients in real time. Work faster and cleaner to earn better rewards, while increasing pressure pushes your focus and coordination to the limit.

Between shifts, upgrade your bar, unlock new equipment, and get ready for tougher challenges. As the crowd grows, staying calm and organized becomes just as important as speed.


Key Features:
- Immersive Bartending Simulation: Experience realistic drink preparation from a first-person perspective.
- Time-Based Challenges: Manage multiple orders under pressure as demand increases.
- Interactive Drink-Making: Mix, pour, shake, and garnish through simple and engaging actions.
- Bar Progression: Earn rewards to upgrade equipment and unlock new possibilities.

Every shift is a test. Only the best bartenders last till closing.
Bartender Simulator 2026 offers a hands-on simulation where timing, precision, and smart decisions turn a simple bar shift into a true test of skill.
70010000113046.intro: Mix fast. Think smart. Rule the bar.
70010000113046.name: Bartender Simulator 2026

70010000115264.description:
A story-rich detective mystery set in 1930s England. Investigate a murder inside a sprawling manor, interrogate suspicious residents, and make meaningful choices to uncover the truth — before Scotland Yard arrives.

A Story-Rich Detective Mystery Where Choices Matter
Clue: Murder by Death is a narrative-driven detective adventure inspired by classic British crime fiction and modern investigative games. Explore an imposing manor, examine evidence, interrogate suspects, and connect clues across multiple branching narrative paths. Every conversation, every alliance, and every accusation shapes the investigation and determines how the story ends.

Who can you trust?

Who is lying?

And what truth will you ultimately uncover?

Key Features
- Story-rich detective mystery set in 1930s England
- Meaningful choices that impact characters and outcomes
- Multiple endings based on your deductions and decisions
- A real-time investigation with a 120-minute limit
- Fully explorable 3D isometric manor packed with secrets
- Deep character-driven narrative with hidden motives and alliances
- Unique visual style blending dark humour and vintage charm
- Original atmospheric soundtrack
70010000115264.intro: England, 1932. A man is dead — and time is running out.
70010000115264.name: Clue: Murder By Death

70010000117547.description:
Backrooms: Poolrooms ... The Poolrooms hold secrets that should never be uncovered...

Strange deaths are plaguing the Poolrooms, and now it's your turn to investigate the horrifying mystery. Bodies have been found floating in the endless, dimly lit pools, their faces twisted in terror. The Poolrooms are no ordinary place - something dark and deadly has taken root, and it's not alone. 

Strange entities have infiltrated the area, stalking you through the water-soaked halls. But they are not like any creature you’ve ever encountered. These entities are invisible, only detectable by the faintest splash they leave behind. As you search for the required things scattered throughout this nightmarish maze, you must be careful, as every step could reveal your position.

But it’s not just the entities you need to watch out for. The waters are teeming with fish, their movements sending ripples through the pool and alerting nearby horrors to your presence. Every splash could be the last sound you ever hear. If you’re too careless, your position will be compromised, and the deadly entities will be upon you.

Can you survive the horrors lurking in the Poolrooms, or will you become another lost soul drifting beneath the surface? Time is running out... and the waters are rising.


Features:
* Investigate the Poolrooms: Explore an eerie, endless labyrinth of pools, flooded hallways, and chilling environments filled with mystery and danger.

* Invisible Entities: The creatures haunting the Poolrooms are invisible to the naked eye. Track them by their splashes and keep a careful watch on your surroundings.

* Dangerous Fish: Watch out for fish lurking in the water - their splashes will give away your position, making you vulnerable to the entities hunting you.

* Tension-filled Atmosphere: A nerve-wracking sound design keeps you on edge, amplifying every footstep, splash, and movement in the darkness.
70010000117547.intro: Time is running out... and the waters are rising
70010000117547.name: Backrooms: Poolrooms

70010000117684.description:
Embark on Speed Dates, where you control first dates with 18 attractive women in this interactive FMV game. Shape your story with charm and humor for a personalized romantic journey.

Our main character Murat attends the Speed Date event and has only a few minutes to get to know the women and make him love himself. Try to impress the girls in this adventure where you can experience today's male-female relationships in the most realistic way.

Features:
•Stunning 4K visuals
•Over 54 unique paths and 36 distinct endings
•500+ meticulously crafted scenes
•8 hours of immersive storytelling
70010000117684.intro: Shape your story with charm and humor for a personalized romantic journey
70010000117684.name: Speed Dates

70050000066413.description:
Give your character a timeless new look with this vintage farmer outfit. 
Sturdy, practical, and full of rustic charm, it’s the perfect style for everyday life on the farm.
This DLC contains the following clothing set: Vintage Outfit + Leather Cap.
70050000066413.name: Sugardew Island - Vintage Farmer Outfit

70050000068274.description: A set of valentines-themed stickers to embellish a sticker album.
70050000068274.name: Valentines Pack

70070000032313.description:
Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade your farm, and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the tiny island with life again. 

If you wish, you can go on dates with friendly locals, each with their own unique personality and backstory!
70070000032313.intro: Run your own farm shop, without any pressure!
70070000032313.name: Sugardew Island - Vintage Farmer Bundle

70010000115960.description:
Experience the beauty of the year, one puzzle at a time, in Jigsaw Realms: Seasons. This relaxing jigsaw experience features beautifully illustrated scenes inspired by all four seasons, from blooming spring landscapes and sunlit summer fields to colorful autumn vistas and peaceful winter wonderlands.

The game includes 30 handcrafted levels with each puzzle celebrating a different moment of the seasonal cycle. Play using touch controls or controllers, and switch between them anytime for a seamless experience!

Perfect for short, cozy sessions or longer puzzle-solving moments, Jigsaw Realms: Seasons invites you to relax and enjoy the changing world around you.

Features:
> 30 handcrafted jigsaw levels inspired by all four seasons
> Spring, summer, autumn, and winter scenes in a stylized fantasy art style
> Save and resume freely whenever you want
> A calm, cozy experience for all ages
70010000115960.intro: Can you complete all 30 seasonal realms?
70010000115960.name: Jigsaw Realms: Seasons

70010000117307.description:
Sakura Peak is a peaceful walking simulator set high in the Sakura-covered mountains of feudal Japan. Wander at your own pace through tranquil landscapes inspired by samurai-era villages, quiet shrines, and endless cherry blossom valleys.

Let the wind guide you along mountain paths as petals fall around you. Listen to the soft sounds of nature, distant temples, and wooden bridges creaking beneath your feet. Sakura Peak is designed to help you slow down, breathe, and simply exist in a beautiful world.

Features:
>Relaxing Walking Simulator – Explore freely with no enemies, timers, or fail states
>Sakura Mountain Landscapes – Cherry blossom forests, misty peaks
>Samurai-Era Atmosphere – Traditional architecture, shrines, and peaceful rural paths
>Calming Soundscape – Gentle ambient music and natural environmental sounds
>Meditative Experience – Designed for relaxation, reflection, and stress relief


Every path in Sakura Peak is crafted to reward curiosity and calm exploration. Follow winding trails, pause to watch petals drift through the air, or stand silently as the sun sets behind the mountains. The world responds not with challenge, but with serenity.
70010000117307.intro: Take the path. Breathe. Walk among the blossoms.
70010000117307.name: Sakura Peak

70070000032878.description:
Racers, beware! 

Fast-paced, polished and dynamic motorbike racing now on Nintendo Switch™!

One of a kind game entirely playable with... Toy-Con™ Motorbike!

Forget about speed limits and traffic rules 'cause on this road you're the boss!

A unique mix of endless and arcade racing game featuring countless hours of fun!

IN MOTO RUSH GT YOU WILL FIND:

• Over 100 levels to beat!
• Endless racing experience
• 12 customizable motorbikes
• Toy-Con™ Motorbike support
• Race against time, ghost opponents or try various challenges! 
• Motion Controls – play by rotating your console!
• Play with the Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller
• Support all play styles - TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode, Toy-Con™ Motorbike
• Experience 4 different game modes 
• Weather and day-cycle effects: rain, night, storm! 
• Experience beautifully designed roads around the world

This bundle includes base game, Grip Collection #2 and Grip Collection #4 with:

- 8 pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control.
70070000032878.intro: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
70070000032878.name: Moto Rush GT Hero's Edition

70070000032959.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Elite Arsenal and Expansion Pack #2 with:

- RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design 
- BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west 
- SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle 
- FMS-1-G rifle
70070000032959.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope Content Edition

70010000117418.description:
Escape Prison Obby: Getaway is a fast-paced parkour (obby) adventure where your goal is simple: break out of prison and reach the escape helicopter!

Features:
>Fun and challenging obby parkour gameplay
>Tricky jumps, moving obstacles, and traps
>Race to reach the helicopter and complete your getaway
>Perfect for casual and competitive players

Do you have what it takes to escape the prison and make a clean getaway?
70010000117418.intro: You’re locked up… but not for long.
70010000117418.name: Escape Prison Obby: Getaway

70010000118469.description:
The Island is an Escape Room where you have to make your way through intelligence and lateral thinking. You will solve a huge number of puzzles while discovering an interesting story and moving through the corners of an island full of challenges. Search for clues, find objects and secrets and keep a cool head, because only then you will be able to get out alive from The Island.

Features
- Dozens of puzzles that will challenge your mind
- Large island with different atmospheres
- A story that will keep you hooked
- From escape room lovers to escape room lovers
70010000118469.intro: You wake up on an unknown island, alone and without help. Will you be able to solve the mysteries it contains? Will you find out how you got there? Could you escape from The Island?
70010000118469.name: The Island - Escape Room

70010000101810.description:
Lead a rag-tag group of kooky carriers in this delivery service RPG as they protect and trek packages through treacherous terrain, unruly monsters, and meet other sneaky delivery service teams ready to stake their claim as the best delivery service in the Orkotris Region!

Rain or shine—a new adventure awaits with every package! 

Key Features

In the Mood for Battle? – Running a tip-top delivery service means mailing out orders AND keeping your crew in check. Watch their moods—if they’re unhappy, they might ignore your commands, but their negligence could deliver positive surprises and even victories in battle!

Out for Delivery! – Head to the Bulletin Board and see what deliveries await! Inspect the parcel, pack it tightly (no gaps allowed!), and assemble your crew with the right gear (to bonk any pesky foes) and tools for a smooth drop-off. Each successful drop-off delivers sweet rewards your way, so handle with care!

Delivery in 3-5 Business Days (Unless you Run into a Boss) – Start your adventure with a roulette spin to determine your next move. Land on shop spaces for goodies, collect special packages for rewards, and maybe tackle some sneaky bosses along the way!

Kei Nanameda… Delivers! – Character designer, Kei Nanameda, presents a fresh delivery service world with lively dialogue, intense battles, and a quirky cast full of energy!
70010000101810.intro: First-class fun in this delivery service RPG with a board game twist!
70010000101810.name: Calamity Angels: Special Delivery

70010000115816.description:
DISCOVER THE LEGEND OF WHAT'S UNDER THE ISLAND!
Uncover a sinking mystery and step into the role of Nia, a newcomer to Seashell Island - and join forces with local girl Avocado to investigate an ominous fate - the island's destined to sink beneath the ocean! Explore colorful regions, battle strange creatures, and uncover the ancient mysteries that could threaten your new home.

CLASSIC TOP-DOWN ADVENTURE
Journey across a lush island, brought to life with vibrant pixel art and timeless top-down exploration. Delve into hidden corners, uncover secrets, and face dangerous foes across diverse, interconnected biomes.

SIX DISTINCT REGIONS TO EXPLORE
From eerie sentient greenhouses, to frozen caverns, and chaotic sawmills, each biome holds its own dangers, upgrades, and treasures to uncover! Become the champion of the cook-off, reunite lost cats, and dodge the rage of the cereal pirates.

STRANGE ENEMIES & UNUSUAL TACTICS
Face off against vomiting eggplants, tunnelling wolves, and other bizarre creatures. Use artefacts, loot, and new abilities you discover to turn the tide of battle. Befriend animals and see if they can help you on your adventure - particularly if you give them treats!

A CAST OF MEMORABLE CHARACTERS
Meet the island’s quirky inhabitants, each with their own personality, story, and a role to play in your adventure. Forge friendships, lend a hand, and see how they can aid you in return.
70010000115816.intro: A 2D action-adventure steeped in ‘90s charm! Step into the shoes of Nia, and battle fierce monsters, solve clever puzzles, and explore a world alive with mystery.
70010000115816.name: UNDER THE ISLAND

70010000102885.description:
Blaze of Storm is a vertical-scrolling shmup featuring cyber-inspired pixel art, exhilarating fast-scrolling, and a variety of sub-weapons.

As a cyberdiver, you'll delve into cyberspace and battle a diverse range of enemies. Each of the five selectable sub-weapons has its own unique characteristics, making it fun to use them appropriately depending on the situation.

In addition, when a sub-weapon comes into contact with an enemy, it generates an explosion that deals continuous damage. Making good use of this explosion is key to victory.

More than 20 unique bosses appear one after another, providing a varied and condensed gameplay experience.
70010000102885.name: Blaze of Storm

70010000111989.description:
Welcome Proxima, we are Counter Horror, an organisation of scientists and occultists who have combined forces to take on the evil threatening our universe. You have been in stasis for some time, you have been awoken to aid in our fight. 
Your psyche level is stable for now, but it won’t be for long, the closer to the outer gods, the less stable humanity becomes, use your military training to end them. Failure is not an option Commander.
Your mission is simple, defend Earth and destroy the Outer Gods.

Play as one of many Proxima’s used to help defend humanity in this turn-based, roguelike, intergalactic deck builder!

- Roguelike: Play as a Proxima, awoken from stasis, with unique skills
- Turn-Based: Command a fleet of upgradable ships through combat
- Deckbuilder: Combine, collect and combo six factions of cards
- Upgrade: Collect artifacts, D.I.C.E and sanity shards to help along your way
- Embrace the occult using powerful ritual cards
- Bosses: Defend Earth and destroy the Outer Gods
- Awaken a Proxima with unique skills and downfalls to help you to take on the horrors
- Command a fleet of upgradable ships across the universe
- Make pivotal decisions when encountering obstacles between combat, which could help boost or decimate your run
- 6 different factions of cards can be combined, collected and combo-ed to defeat the horrors in your own way
- Control your fate using D.I.C.E to increase your chances of survival during random encounters
- Embrace the occult using ritual cards to powerfully destroy and beat the competition
- Earn credits to buy and upgrade your cards
- Unlock artifacts on your run to transform your ships powers
- Unlock multiple different Proxima’s, each with their own unique set of skills and downfalls
70010000111989.intro: Earth has fallen. Science and the Occult have united forces to brace for the arrival of the Eldritch. But will the efforts against this strange, alien race be enough?
70010000111989.name: Starless Abyss

70010000072098.description:
Lux has no time for bullies. To take down the Skate Bums who dominate Beluga City, she'll have to beat them at their own game, even though she's never touched a board before!

Jump into an epic journey from total newbie to legendary skater! Navigate through hostile turf in quick, intense sessions, taking down the Skate Bums one by one. But beware - they don't play fair! To rise to the top, you'll need to master your environment, outsmart your rivals, and shred through gnarly multi-layered levels with undeniable style.

Inspired by the skate culture of the 80s and 90s, Skate Bums blends fast, expressive 2D action with old-school flavour, all delivered in a vibrant illustrative art style. Are you ready to prove that anyone can skate their way to greatness?

FEATURES:
• Boss Battles on skateboards
• In-your-face 90s art style
• Simple directional trick system
• Quick session gameplay
• Multi-layered levels
• Over 100 unlockable items
• High-score and challenge progression
• 90s soundtrack
• A skateboarding story full of weird characters
70010000072098.name: Skate Bums

70010000075213.description:
Buskers, party animals, troublemakers. They’ve been given many names, but they call themselves Baladins! These legendary heroes wander from town-to-town to fulfill their sacred quest: entertaining the masses!

It’s a difficult task, but one the Baladins take in stride. From helping those in need to throwing parties, they bring surprises with them wherever their travels take them. All that matters to them is bringing joy to the people who inhabit the bright and lively world of Gatherac.

Embark on your quest as one of the Baladins: the imaginative Cook, the crafty Luxomancer, the strapping Dancer, the expressive Pyro, or the ever-charismatic Bard. United by their passion for happiness, each Baladin brings their own unique skills to the table and can hone their talents further throughout the adventure by making choices and collecting items. 

Inspired by tabletop roleplaying campaigns, Baladins is a choose-your-own-story game for players of all ages and experience levels. Roll the dice and see where your adventures take you. Your decisions are not inherently good or bad – just creative approaches that can lead to interesting outcomes!

And if you’d rather not play alone, Baladins supports up to four players–either locally or online! You can spread your journey over bite-sized sessions so you can explore Gatherac and its many secrets at your own pace. The story of any given session can change wildly depending on the choices you make each turn, so each playthrough brings its own new surprises!

Features

- Choose your own adventure! Bring joy to the people of Gatherac with 1-4 players and let your collective choices shape the fate of this unusual world.
- Be a hero! Play as one of five unique classes, each with its own strengths and weaknesses, and watch your character grow as the story unfolds!
- Play at your own pace! The story of the Baladins can be played in short sessions over the course of the whole campaign.
- Encounter a dragon! It wouldn’t be a fantasy roleplaying game without one!
70010000075213.intro: Go on a whimsical journey through a fantasy world in this roleplaying adventure
70010000075213.name: Baladins

70010000081345.description:
A brand new PARANORMASIGHT tale begins in Ise-Shima, Japan - a region rich in mermaid legends.
Join a cast of fascinating characters investigating the mysteries of the Mermaids of Ise. Unravel their different perspectives on the case and guide the story to its thrilling conclusion.

Story:
The remote island of Kameshima sits nestled in Ise bay.
Yuza Minakuchi is a young pearl diver who lives on the island and spends his days underwater gathering, together with his best friend Azami Kumoi. After he has a bewildering supernatural experience encountering another version of himself on the ocean floor, a series of curses start to befall the island...
A girl of unknown origins, a treasure hunter from a foreign land and a mysterious housewife investigating a drowning. Paths cross and destinies collide as they come closer to the secret of the Mermaids of Ise, a legend that has been obscured by the fog of history for so long. 

Features:
- A brand-new story that starts with a new location, new supernatural legends and a new cast of characters.
- Faithful reproductions of real locations and vistas in collaboration with Mie prefecture. Investigate stunning 360 degree backgrounds for clues.
- Numerous new gameplay systems and mechanics, including a new Diving mini game.
- Multiple characters, each dealing with their own mysteries to unravel.
- Unearth the truth by your own hand! 

*Once you have downloaded the game, no further monetary transactions are required and the whole story can be enjoyed to the ending.
70010000081345.intro: Will you survive the curse together this summer?
70010000081345.name: PARANORMASIGHT: The Mermaid's Curse

70010000093576.description:
Run, jump, and reverse the flow of gravity itself to escape the mind of a selfish god in this challenging precision platformer. Play as Maya, a child stolen from her family on the whim of a lonely, forsaken deity, and make your way through over 100 screens filled with spikes, lasers, switches, and traps as you unravel the horrifying secret of your new prison.

- Gorgeous hand-drawn pixel art graphics bring the god’s realm to life alongside meticulously handcrafted animations boasting many thousands of frames
- A lush, atmospheric score, equal parts unsettling and beautiful
- Responsive, snappy controls provide challenges with a sense of mastery and acrobatic accomplishment
- A psychological horror narrative contorts and unfolds to reveal choices beyond comprehension

Will you find your way home, or wander these halls carved of memory forever?
70010000093576.intro: Wander a castle built of bitter memories in LOVE ETERNAL, a psychological horror platformer with devious trials and an unsettling, experimental narrative.
70010000093576.name: LOVE ETERNAL

70010000096208.description:
ENTER THE DUNGEON
The city of Wizarest has been cut off from communication with the outside world. Those who have awakened have forgotten who they are, who their neighbors are, and live without any memories of their past. The only things they know are the dangers of the dungeons surrounding the city, the monsters that inhabit them, and the magic needed to counter them. The citizens have been trying to navigate the dungeons for years, but to no avail. Even after 100 years, no exit has been found. Now, a new wizard is heading into the dungeons to defy the monsters…

THE BATTLE SYSTEM
Welcome to WiZmans World Re;Try! This is a thrilling RPG adventure with a fantastic story that changes based on your choices, and a deep yet simple battle system. Make full use of the timeline above the screen to develop your strategy: read the enemy's HP, the attack order, everyone's status, and aim for the most effective way to win. Water is stronger than Fire, Fire is stronger than Wind, Wind is stronger than Earth, and Earth is stronger than Water. Keep this in mind and use the best attacks to counter the enemy. Don't forget to chain attacks to defeat enemies quickly!

MEET THE HOMUNCULI
At first glance, the homunculi of WiZmans World Re;Try look like fairies. They have the power to ease the souls of defeated monsters and can fuse with them through Anima Fusion. Thanks to Anima Fusion, they can inherit the stats, status effects, skills, and appearance of defeated monsters. Adopt stronger monster abilities, inherit skills, and create your own powerful guardian. With the homunculi at your side, you're never truly alone!

A CLASSIC FROM 2009
Jaleco, known for releasing games until 2000, launched this RPG classic on portable consoles in 2009. The game features well-drawn pixel graphics and a simple yet challenging difficulty level, earning high praise from RPG fans. In this remaster, the graphics have been enhanced, the BGM rearranged, new tracks added (all remade by soLi), and the UI and playability optimized. This is the ultimate version of WiZmans World, with all the charm of the original.
70010000096208.intro: Harness your magic powers, absorb enemies, and evolve your three homunculi to triumph. It's a truly spellbinding adventure!
70010000096208.name: WiZmans World Re;Try

70010000100404.description:
Step into the myth-shrouded lands where the hunter Ro begins her journey to bring her son back from the dead. Immerse yourself in the depths of the Spirit World, fractured into 4 realms and scarred with 13 distinct regions. Confront over 30 enemy types and harness the potential of more than 160 cards, forging unique archetypes and a multitude of powerful combinations. A dark journey awaits you, spanning 25+ hours of gameplay, with numerous enthralling side quests and grim boss battles.

Master Your Deck-Building Skills
Craft over 160 cards and fashion synergistic decks that focus on poison, strength, sacrifice, retaliation, backstabbing, blocking, movement, and more. Discover shamanic totems with unique effects to enhance your deck. Each new element allows you to tailor your tactical style as you prepare for your next deadly encounter.

Engage in Grid-Based Combat
Face a host of restless spirits - Skulldogs, Crackle Bursts, Woeful Seashrooms and more - in grid-based battles where each move is crucial. Test your wit by fighting unique enemy types, powerful bosses, and mini-bosses, all while taking into account environmental hazards and boons. Grow stronger, adapt your deck, and choose your battles as you explore a vast world filled with dangerous challenges.

Journey to the spirit realm
In forgotten lands shrouded by myth, Ro - a hunter from a small tribe - is overcome by grief following the death of her beloved son. Guided by voices from another world, she transcends into the realm of spirits, in hopes of bringing him back. Meet strange spirits and help them with quests and challenges that affect your deck – although not all of them may have your best interests at heart. Discover a mysterious world of forgotten lore, where darkness whispers secrets and invites you to unearth buried memories.
70010000100404.name: Death Howl

70010000105809.description:
Let's play a game again. The game you already know. Still on the real streets. The rule is the same - score.    

New areas where the streetball can be played. Discover new locations your best game. Old areas and new areas - all is here to bring you the maximum joy. Sometimes it's not easy, but it's always fun! Jump, rotate, dunk, score. Repeat. Beat all the records in the game. Set your own level of supremacy!         

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Keep playing the streetball in your own way!
70010000105809.intro: The streets are calling us again! It's time to play!
70010000105809.name: Dunk Trickster 2

70010000107107.description:
Taking Satisfactory, Forager and the gratifying gameplay loop of clicker/idle games as references, Outpath would be just that. Exploit your environment, craft, build and automate your base in this 3D first-person platformer!

Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure, play at your own pace and style.

Gather, collect and manage resources.
Craft useful items.
Base building, automate everything.
Buy islands to expand and exploit!
Fishing.
Level up skills and unlock new blueprints.
Parkour movements.
Play active or idle, you choose!
Music reacts to your actions.
Uncover the secrets of this stylized place.
70010000107107.intro: Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure, play at your own pace and style.
70010000107107.name: Outpath

70010000109188.description:
With his family slain and village destroyed, Korvald is branded a heretic and seemingly condemned to death, but the truth of his torment is part of a bigger and more sinister agenda! Join forces with beautiful warrior nuns, alluring mythical figures and interdimensional creatures to prevent our world from being devoured. Can you contain your primal urges and fight to survive?

Book of Korvald is a side-scrolling 2D action-adventure where each chapter takes place across an entire country, spanning more than 30 areas of Scandinavia and beyond. Control Korvald as he makes key decisions, encounters dozens of memorable characters and wields a huge variety of weapons against his foes, from axes and swords to whips and maces! Use runes to unleash powerful elemental spells or summon creatures to assist you. Customize your skills to match your playstyle and face off against 30 unique bosses!

• Explore 30 stages as a condemned Norse scribe!
• Wield various weapon types in real-time combat.
• Unlock and upgrade skills across an expansive talent tree!
• Engage in mini-games, from fishing and farming to drinking contests and arena battles.
• Meet dozens of female companions and other unique NPCs!
70010000109188.intro: Guide a tormented Norse scribe and in his desperate alliance with a parasitic eldritch entity!
70010000109188.name: Book of Korvald

70010000110648.description:
Welcome to a world where desire, destiny, and strategy collide.

In Arcana, the legendary Tarot cards are no longer symbols.
They are seductive, powerful women, each one representing a different Arcana with her own personality, intentions, and hidden motives.

Talk to them.
Go on dates to unlock new abilities.
Gain their trust… or provoke their ambition.

But connection is only the beginning.

When conflict begins, conversations give way to strategic, roguelite-inspired card battles, where each run challenges you to adapt, plan, and evolve your approach.

Build your deck using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and face enemy armies in encounters where every card matters.

Your choices shape more than relationships.
They define how your Arcana fight, how they evolve, and which powers they are willing to unleash for you.

This is not a traditional visual novel.
This is a fusion of narrative intimacy and tactical card combat.


Features:

● ARCANA AS CHARACTERS: 
The Tarot comes to life as powerful, seductive women, each with unique abilities, personalities, and motivations.

● NARRATIVE PROGRESSION & DATES:
Talk to the Arcana, go on dates, and unlock new skills that directly affect combat.

● STRATEGIC ROGUELITE CARD COMBAT:
Every run is different. Adapt your deck, manage risk, and refine your strategy as challenges escalate.

● DECK BUILDING & SYNERGY:
Create powerful combinations using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and shape your own playstyle.

● ARMY BASED ENCOUNTERS:
Face increasingly dangerous enemy forces in tactical card battles where positioning and timing matter.

● CHOICE DRIVEN EVOLUTION:
Your decisions influence how the Arcana grow, fight, and what powers they are willing to reveal.


Some Arcana seek control.
Others crave devotion.
All of them have a price.

Will you master the cards…
or let them master you?
70010000110648.intro:
Seductive Arcana.
Strategic cards.
Power is won by choice.
70010000110648.name: The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Queens of Madness

70010000110659.description:
Welcome to a world where power, destiny, and strategy collide.

In "The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Kings of Madness", the legendary Tarot cards are no longer symbols.
They are dangerous, charismatic men, each embodying a different Arcana, driven by ambition, dominance, and hidden intent.

Talk to them.
Go on dates to unlock new abilities.
Earn their loyalty… or challenge their authority.

But connection is only the beginning.

When conflict begins, conversations give way to strategic, roguelite-inspired card battles, where every run challenges you to adapt, plan, and assert control.

Build your deck using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and face enemy armies in encounters where every card shapes the outcome.

Your choices shape more than relationships.
They define how your Arcana fight, how they evolve, and which powers they are willing to place in your hands.

This is not a traditional visual novel.
This is a fusion of narrative tension and tactical card combat.

Some Arcana seek domination.
Others demand loyalty.
All of them have a price.


Features:

● ARCANA AS CHARACTERS:
The Tarot comes to life as powerful male Arcana, each with distinct abilities, personalities, and ambitions.

● NARRATIVE PROGRESSION & DATES:
Talk to the Arcana, go on dates, and unlock new skills that directly affect combat.

● STRATEGIC ROGUELITE CARD COMBAT:
Every run is different. Adapt your deck, manage risk, and refine your strategy as challenges escalate.

● DECK BUILDING & SYNERGY:
Create powerful combinations using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and define your own playstyle.

● ARMY BASED ENCOUNTERS:
Face increasingly dangerous enemy forces in tactical card battles where positioning and timing matter.

● CHOICE DRIVEN EVOLUTION:
Your decisions influence how the Arcana grow, fight, and which powers they are willing to place at your disposal.


Will you command the cards…
or lose yourself to their madness?
70010000110659.intro:
Dark Arcana.
Strategic cards.
Power bends to your will.
70010000110659.name: The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Kings of Madness

70010000112521.description:
Ready for a brand new Lost in Space adventure? Explore treacherous environments, solve puzzles and mysteries as you investigate the disappearance of the other members of the Jupiter 2!

After being trapped in a cave on a late-night rock hunting excursion, Will returns to the spaceship only to find that it's been raided during the night! Team up with the mercurial Dr. Smith and the always-faithful Robot, to unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Will's parents, his sisters as well as Major Don West.

Lost in Space – the First Adventure will return you to the imaginative world of the beloved 60's television series. The game is designed to be the spiritual "fourth season" that fans have always craved. Recreated with loving detail to perfectly capture the personalities of all the members of the Jupiter 2. 

KEY FEATURES: 
-The game lovingly recreates the wonderous world of the beloved 60's television series in this “fourth season” spiritual successor.
-Match wits with some of the original series' most nefarious villains including Saticons, Invaders from the Fifth Dimension, the Giant Cyclops and more!
-The game uses dialogue taken directly from the show as well as the original music including the iconic theme songs!
-Work your way through lots of challenging puzzles along with a multi-tiered help system to assure that you'll never get stuck.
70010000112521.intro: Point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space - play as Will Robinson and team up with Dr. Smith and Robot!
70010000112521.name: Lost In Space - The First Adventure

70010000112962.description:
In a place in Albuquerque, New Mexico, USA, a strange accident occurred on October 27, 1986. Everything was recorded on a VHS tape. 

Enter the eerie world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and surreal spaces. After a freak accident, you find yourself trapped in the Backrooms, a place where logic and reality vanish.  Explore endless corridors of yellow carpet, empty rooms and areas of flickering light as you try to find a way out. But beware: you are not alone. Mysterious entities lurk in the shadows, and every sound may be the last you hear. 

Features: 

Immersive Exploration: Navigate an immersive environment made with unique level design. Discover hidden secrets and an immersive narrative that will draw you into the story. 

Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in an oppressive atmosphere with immersive sound effects and haunting graphics that will keep you on the edge of your seat. 

Challenges and Puzzles: Solve riddles and face challenges that will test your wits as you try to escape from the Backrooms. 

Varied Environments: Backrooms Level X consists of more than 15 levels to explore. Discover the intricacies of the story and enemies, keeping each game a fresh and exciting experience. 

Defiant Bosses: Get out unscathed from huge final enemies. Throughout the exploration, we will encounter gigantic bosses that we will have to defeat with our wits. 

Do you have what it takes to survive in the Backrooms? The only way out is to face your fears and discover the truth behind this terrifying place. Download Backrooms Level X and begin your journey into the unknown!
70010000112962.intro: Enter the disturbing world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person narrative survival horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and liminal spaces.
70010000112962.name: Backrooms Level X

70010000114266.description:
[Overview]
Shizuku and Akane… two pilots bound by rivalry and friendship battle to save their world from malevolent cosmic forces!

Multi-directional boomerang-style melee attacks, flamethrowers, burst lasers… a huge range of weapons is at your disposal to mix and match as you customise your ship and battle waves of enemies and bosses across a variety of game modes, including Local Co-Op Duo Play Mode and Boost Mode. Tweak the rules, team up for co-op play, or take on high-score challenges!

[Gameplay]
Pilot the super-advanced Revolgear space fighters Pheasant or Dove, and use precise movement, smart weapon choices and combat skills to earn extra lives and maximise your score!

Use the Bit Shoot attack for boomerang-style melee strikes, the burst system for a powerful energy beam, plus loads of other weapons and loadouts you’ll unlock as you play!

[Features]
- Seven stages with four difficulty options.
- Two main game modes with six possible endings.
- Over 2,000 equipment combinations. Builds can be customised to suit each player’s preferences.
- Mission Mode with 30 different challenges to test your skills with various weapons and techniques.
- An unlock shop where you can obtain custom weapons and gear using in-game currency.
- Diverse stage designs: from menacing mechs to mystical dragons—anything goes!
- Two main characters with voice acting. Enjoy dialogues that change depending on the situation.
- Local co-op! In certain modes, an algorithmic AI partner can also join the fight.
- Includes the bizarre mystery bonus game “God of Cats”!
- In-game achievements.
70010000114266.intro: Fast-paced shmup action, loads of loadout combos, and local co-op!
70010000114266.name: Revolgear Zero

70010000114299.description:
Seafrog is an action-platformer mashed with the movement of lite-skateboarding. Grind, kick-flip and find the flow with a rocket-powered wrench that moves smoother than a buttered beluga!

A SEA-SLICK PLATFORMER
String together combos by using a simple auto-trick system, landing grinds on enemies and rusty pipes to fuel up your rocket-wrench! Use the fuel to boost through enemies, fly straight up walls, and stick to ceilings in order to complete over 100 handcrafted challenges!

EXPLORE RUN-DOWN SHIPS
Each chapter in Seafrog is based on a ships theme. Battle vengeful Viking ghosts aboard the Sea Dragon. Dig in for an unsavory meal aboard the Chunky Chacken, where you’ll discover a man-eating chicken outbreak. Finally, get ready for some monkey business at The Sweater Factory, an abandoned workshop run by an unexpected crew of apes causing all the ruckus. Each chapter holds a Master Gear, guarded by an ultimate boss.

MASTER GEAR, HO!
Battle the legendary Skraken, Metal Beak the Momma Chacken, and... Gerald. Face these colorful 'n crusty foes to retrieve the Master Gears and repair your cannon. Blast yourself to a stranded seaplane to escape The Seahole, a mysterious sinking hole in the ocean… before ye end up in Davy Jones' Locker!
70010000114299.intro: Hop aboard Seafrog’s rocket-powered wrench and slide, grind, and trick your way through a one-of-a-kind 2.5D action-puzzle-platformer!
70010000114299.name: Seafrog

70010000114700.description:
All aboard! Get ready for a colorful, brain-teasing puzzle experience where your goal is simple but oh-so-addictive: arrange all passengers to fit perfectly on their matching buses. Sounds easy? Think again!

In this fun and relaxing puzzle game, you’ll face increasingly tricky challenges as you sort passengers by color and seat them correctly before the buses depart. Each level brings new patterns, tighter spaces, and more passengers to organize — testing your logic, speed, and strategic thinking.

Game Features:

Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Drag and arrange passengers so they fit into their designated bus seats. Every move counts!

Dozens of Fun Levels: Start simple and progress to more complex puzzles with multiple buses and limited space.

Colorful and Relaxing Visuals: A bright, cheerful design to keep your mind sharp and your mood lifted.

Earn Coins and Unlock Challenges: Complete levels perfectly to earn rewards and unlock new puzzles.

Brain-Training Gameplay: Sharpen your problem-solving skills while having endless fun.

Quick, Pick-up-and-Play Sessions: Perfect for short breaks or long puzzle-solving marathons.

Can you keep up with the rush and seat every passenger before the buses leave? Test your organizational skills, plan your moves carefully, and become the ultimate bus puzzle master!

Hop in, line up your passengers, and let the puzzle journey begin!
70010000114700.intro: Arrange passengers perfectly and master the ultimate bus puzzle challenge!
70010000114700.name: Bus Stop Shuffle

70010000115253.description:
Cargo Runner: Mars puts you in charge of high-risk supply deliveries on the Red Planet.
